title: Betsy & Adam Women's Long 3/4 Sleeve Embroidered Chiffon Gown
description: Model is wearing a size 4 dress. Size 4 measures approximately 61" from shoulder to hem.
Fits true to size for a perfect, comfortable fit.
Features built-in bra cups for added support and convenience.
This dress is fitted at the waist and loosely fitted at the hips. The fabric has no stretch.
The flowy silhouette and delicate applique detailing exude understated elegance, perfect for formal gatherings.

Get ready to turn heads in the "Brooklyn" Long Embroidery Dress. Made of luxurious chiffon, this dress is fully lined for comfort and has a hidden center back zipper for a seamless fit. The delicate 3/4 sleeve and intricate embroidery add a touch of boldness and adventure to your wardrobe.
